thread.title: Cops searching for man who robbed $10K from popular diner

author: Jazmin Rosa
title: Cops searching for man who robbed $10K from popular diner
text:

Back Continue   Advertisement Cops searching for man who robbed $10K from popular diner February 21, 2017 A popular vegan diner in Williamsburg was robbed of thousands of dollars early Monday morning, according to police.
Champs Diner, a hip diner housed on Meserole Street and Bushwick Avenue, was hit around 1:30 a.m. Monday morning by a robber who broke in through a side door.
The perp was caught on film exiting the diner after stealing four iPads, a Galaxy Tablet, an Amazon Fire Kindle and two safes which contained about $10,000 in cash total, cops say.
Pictured wearing a green knit hat and pants, a grey hoodie and tan coat, the burglar can be seen rattling a nearby bicycle– presumably to see if it was chained– nearby before finally fleeing on foot.
